column1: Calembel was a town in the Lamedon region of Gondor. It was located on the road between Erech and Pelargir
column2: at the fords of the river Ciril.

column1: During the War of the Ring
column2: the town was deserted. Most of the men had gone to fight in Minas Tirith
column3: and those that remained fled into the hills as they heard news of the coming of the Oathbreakers.

column2: p. 537 (citing from the Unfinished index) The name likely consists of Sindarin calen "green" + pÃªl "fence".
